name: Team Zombie
description:
You start as a single zombie, but let's change the world! Try to convert as many people as possible to your undead team. 

People will flee if they see you, and flee if they see other people fleeing.  Don't let them get to the rescue helicoptor!  Start slow until you build a swarm, then be more bold!

Controls:

Use left, middle, and right clicks. 

Use the , , , and keys.

For best results download the game.  

The in-browser game is slightly buggy with middle clicks and large crowds but should help you decide if it's for you.

A submission to the 2022 GameDev.TV game jam.
